page.title: 07SHOPPING IN SOUTHSEA
page.content: Southsea is one of three important shopping areas in Portsmouth and is mostly used by people who live in the area. In the summer there are a lot of holiday visitors who shop there. The shops include two department stores, chain stores such as W.H.Smith and Boots, furniture and clothes shops, and several restaurants and cafes. A particular feature is the great number of speciality shops such as antique shops and jewellers. Most of the people interviewed like the shopping precinct because it is peaceful without vehicles but some think it is rather dirty and needs more rubbish bins. Some think that there should be more cafes and record shops and that a branch of Marks and Spencers would be useful in the precinct.One manager said that trade is excellent and increasing.
